column4: Can someone who speaks spanish please tell Marcelo_24_MSN to go to #ubuntu-es or whatever it is?
please paste stuf in #flood, not here
any file you create you can edit, though
i'm trying to save /etc/pcmcia/config to save and it keeps telling me it fails
but X will not fail to start just because it's log is missing
show us the exact wording in #flood
that doesn't sound like X caring about the log being gone
not unless you actually know what the problem is
login to a terminal and run "X".  if it pops up a black and white screen, hit ctrl-alt-delete
